name: Thankyou Robot
description:
Roleplay as a helpful robot in this short, chill, Gameboy experience.

Controls:
Alt / Z / J - Interact/Confirm
Ctrl / K / X - Cancel
Arrow Keys/WASD - Movement

Also available as a Gameboy rom below.

Director: Ash McAllan
Art: Clover Greenhalgh
Writing: Shayne Strawbridge
Music: Gerard Spalding
